recipe.title: Togarashi Popcorn
instructions: Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic; stir 1 minute. Remove from heat. Cover; keep warm. Heat kernels and both oils in a large covered pot over medium-high heat; cook until almost all kernels have popped. Transfer popcorn to a large bowl. Drizzle garlic butter over popcorn; toss to coat. Sprinkle togarashi over; toss again.
